summary.work_experience_detail: lalala I have professional experience (after university) since currently $workdays days. Currently I'm working at fme AG in Braunschweig, Germany.
summary.education_detail: After the university degree I can't stop to learn. Currently I finished $certNum online course-certificates already and I'm open for new ones.
summary.mindset_detail: I love new programming languages, modern tools and modern work. I love to work from home & testing out new things.
summary.more_detail: I really like cycling in the woods or near the sea, programming of course and to listen or make music. Another wonderful thing is kayaking on rivers.
